sentences: Ajayan Adat born in Thrissur on December 31, 1987.
He is working in film sector as recordist, Sync sound Recordist mainly in Malayalam films.
He is best known for his works in  films like Soni (film), Nayattu (2021 film), Virus, Koode etc.

After completing his Graduation in Physics from the Sree Kerala Varma College in 2008, he joined the Film and Television Institute of India, Pune for Post Graduation Diploma in Sound Recording and Sound Design.
After graduating in 2016, he started his career in Malayalam film industry as recordist, Sync sound Recordist.,
